title: GET ME OUT OF HERE !!!
review: I don't scare easy , but this did it for me. It's a ride you want to jump out of but can't cause your already hooked. The story acting actors music cinematography and direction were perfect to me. A rare gem worthy of every of the 10 stars

title: Is this how to beat thanos?
review: Captain Marvel is so lousy and a weapon the avengers can use to bore Thanos to submission.

title: Ass
review: What a lousy movie . It started of with promise only to loose direction in the final. Jordan Peele has made an ass of us and we the audience and anyone giving rave reviews is akin of to subject praising the emperor new clothes!
